optInAnalyticsModal.helpUsToImprove: HELP US IMPROVE LIQUALITY TO BETTER SERVE YOU
optInAnalyticsModal.shareWhereYouClick: Share where you click. There is no identifying data. This permission can be revoked at any time.

passwordCreationScreen.password8char: Passwords must be at least 8 characters

seedPhraseConfirmationScreen.tap3wordMatching: Tap the 3 words matching their position in the seed phrase. Once confirmed, store the phrase securely.

seedPhraseScreen.restoreYourWallet: The seed phrase is the only way to restore your wallet. Write itdown. Next you will confirm it.

termsScreen.termCopy:
THIS IS THE BETA VERSION OF THE LIQUALITY PLATFORM WHICH IS STILL BEING ACTIVELY DEVELOPED. YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THE INFORMATION AVAILABLE IS NOT INTENDED TO BE RELIED ON OR USED IN A PRODUCTION ENVIRONMENT. YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND ACCEPT THAT THE SITE OR SERVICES 
 (A) MAY CONTAIN BUGS, ERRORS, AND DEFECTS, 
 (B) MAY FUNCTION IMPROPERLY OR BE SUBJECT TO PERIODS OF DOWNTIME AN UNAVAILABILITY, 
 (C) MAY RESULT IN TOTAL OR PARTIAL LOSS OR CORRUPTION OF DATA USED IN THE SITE, AND 
 (D) MAY BE MODIFIED AT ANY TIME, INCLUDING THROUGH THE RELEASE OF SUBSEQUENT VERSIONS, ALL WITH OR WITHOUT NOTICE. THE ALPHA PLATFORM IS AVAILABLE ON AN “AS IS” AND “AS AVAILABLE” BASIS FOR THE SOLE PURPOSE OF COLLECTING FEEDBACK ON QUALITY, USABILITY, PERFORMANCE AND ANY DEFECTS. THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT WHILE WE CONTINUE TO WORK ON DELIVERING A PERFECT PRODUCT.
